_comment2: AWS SNS SMS - EXAMPLE ALARM CONFIGURATION
_comment4: This example demonstrates AWS SNS SMS notifications.
_comment7: 1. Configure AWS SNS in your .env file:
_comment12: 2. OPTIONAL: Set AWS_SNS_TOPIC_ARN to publish to an SNS topic
_comment13: If omitted, SMS will be sent directly to phone numbers
_comment16: 3. Set SMS provider in alarm config below to 'aws_sns', 'sns', or 'aws'
_comment20: NOTE: All provider configs (email, SMS) are in .env file, not here!

alarms.name: lightning-nearby
alarms.description: Alert when lightning strikes within 2 miles

sms.message: ⚡ LIGHTNING ALERT: Strike {{lightning_distance}}mi away. Seek shelter!
